page.title: 13Seagraves Farm.
page.content: 'Seagraves'farm is an arable farm situated near the village of Penn. It has 600 acres of land in which to grow it's two main crops of wheat and rape.There are a number of tree plantations consisting of both coniferous and deciduous trees.The farm owns quite a lot of equipment and keeps ducks and chickens,although these are not commercial produce. There are a number of houses near the farm,one of which used to be a private school but is now privately owned.One of the other houses has a back garden facing one of the farm's wheat fields. It has a tennis court and a helicopter parked on the lawn. This is a very beautiful area with large areas of beautiful countryside surrounding it.It is conveniently near to London and is thus a commuter region used by London businessmen.
